entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 6:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: N 29 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Rain over eastern sections. Snowfall amount 5 cm over western sections. Wind north 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rain over eastern sections early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High 12. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:22 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
